name: Import Orders Export Orders WooCommerce Products Subscriptions with Excel
author: extendWP

sections.description:
Import Export WooCommerce Products Orders Subscriptions with Excel and Migrate you Eshop Easily with the power of xlsx file. All in One Solution for your WooCommerce data.

This plugin will provide you an interface to easily import or export WooCommerce Simple Products, Orders Import, Orders Export for Simple Products, Coupons, Customers

The plugin works with Ajax with no PHP timeouts and will save you time during Migration

HPOS WooCommerce Orders Table and PHP 8.2 compatible!

HOW DOES IT WORK

In order to migrate your old eshop to a new website you can follow this series of actions:

  • if your old website is in WordPress, install the plugin and Export WooCommerce Products, Export Customers, Export WooCommerce Orders and Export WooCommerce Coupons to Excel.
  • Import WooCommerce Products with Excel
  • Import WooCommerce Customers with Excel
  • Import WooCommerce Coupons with Excel
  • Finally do WooCommerce Orders Import with Excel
  • Import WooCommerce Subcriptions in the PRO Version with excel, Export WooCommerce Subcriptions in the PRO Version with excel

WOOCOMMERCE IMPORT

  • you go to Import Screen / Import Products, Import Customers, Import Orders or Import Coupons
  • there you can download example xlsx file and work based on it
  • import the xlsx file
  • go to excel columns mapping screen and easily DRAG & DROP the data

WOOCOMMERCE EXPORT

  • you go to Export Screen / Export Products, Export Customers, Export Orders or Export Coupons
  • use criteria for your export query
  • choose what fields to export
    finally you get a table of fields that can be downloaded in xlsx, csv, or txt format

ALL FEATURES

  1. Import WooCommerce Simple Products using data added to xlsx file variable,affiliate and subscription in PRO Version
  2. Update WooCommerce Simple Products using data added to xlsx file by ID or TITLE variable,affiliate and subscription in PRO Version
  3. Export WooCommerce Simple Products to xlsx, csv or txt file variable,affiliate and subscription in PRO Version
  4. Customer Import: Import WooCommerce Customers using data added to xlsx file
  5. Customer Export: Export WooCommerce Customers to xlsx, csv or txt file
  6. Coupon Import: Import WooCommerce Coupons using data added to xlsx file
  7. Coupon Export: Export WooCommerce Coupons to xlsx, csv or txt file
  8. Order Import: Import WooCommerce Orders using data added to xlsx file variable products support in PRO Version
  9. Order Export: Export WooCommerce Orders to xlsx, csv or txt file

STORE MIGRATION PRO VERSION

  • Automap excel columns to product fields feature that makes Import / Update process even faster
  • Import Products Extra features:
  • you can update Products by SKU
  • you can import / update WooCommerce Variable Products
  • you can import / update WooCommerce Affiliate/ External Products
  • you can import / update WooCommerce Subscription Products
  • you can import / export WooCommerce Subcriptions
  • you can import Variable Products choosing which Attribute used for Variations (in case of many Attributes that not used in Variation)
  • Import Variable Product with using only one excel row and comma separated attribute values ( variations share same data)
  • import support for extra fields of WooCommerce Products such as featured image, product image gallery
  • import support for custom meta fields (ACF Support) of WooCommerce Products
  • import support for YOAST SEO META title, description and focus keyword of WooCommerce Products
  • Update WooCommerce Products by SKU
  • WPML Support for Importing WooCommerce Product Translations with Excel
  • Import WooCommerce Product Reviews with excel
  • Export WooCommerce Product Reviews to excel (xlsx,csv and txt option)
  • Import WooCommerce Product Cateogry terms with excel
  • WooCommerce Orders Import Extra features:
  • Import WooCommerce Order with support for Variable Products
  • Apply WooCommerce Coupon in Orders
  • Create Customers during WooCommerce Order Import, if not exist

Get it Here
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory and unzip, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Store Migration menu link, ‘Store Migration’ Submenu on Woocommerce or Settings link on plugins page to use the plugin.
sections.faq:
What is the correct sequence of actions to Migrate my WooCommerce Eshop ?

Add WooCommerce Products, Customers, then you can import (if any) Coupons and finally import your WooCommerce Orders.

Can I upload unlimited products,orders,coupons with this plugin?

Yes of course, it works with Ajax, there are no PHP timeouts, it imports/updates/exports Simple Products.

Can I update WooCommerce Products by SKU?

This feature is available in the PRO Version.

Can I import Variable, Affiliate, Subscription WooCommerce Products?

This feature is available in the PRO Version.

Can I import WooCommerce Subscriptions?

This feature is available in the PRO Version.

Can I import / update YOAST SEO Meta Fields for the Products like Title and description?

This feature is available in the PRO Version.
